html.body:
My pleasure knows no bounds to express a few words regarding the launch of official App of Leprosy Control Division. Digital and technological innovations today have helped bridge information gap between stakeholders and organizations. By virtue of the intensive infiltration of digital devices into our daily lives, we have radically altered how we communicate with one another and with our entire social network at once. I firmly believe our App will assist to catapult health system forward. As a result of technological know-how, we can be more competent at providing key information to various stakeholders with tremendous ease and reliability. 

This App will acquaint all concerned regarding different aspects of Leprosy and public health undertakings of our organization. We will leave no stone unturned to keep this App updated and make you informed about Leprosy Control Division. 

Thank you! 

Mohammad Daud 

Director
